p: The extracts were screened against 9 different bacterial strains: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051, Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212, Proteus vulgaris ATCC 6380, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027, Salmonella typhi clinical sample, Shigella dysenteriae clinical sample, Staphylococcus aures ATCC 6538P, methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) clinical sample, and Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 1228. Chloramphenicol was used as the standard antibacterial agent.
